name: Get Away Driver
description:
Can YOU escape the cops in this accurate to life bank-robbing game?! Play as a bank heist's getaway driver as you explore a city, rob a bank, and get back to your hideout! It's not all sunshine and rainbows, however, as you'll have to dodge and weave your way through the city's legion of cops on your way to becoming the world's greatest street driver!

CONTROLS:

Drive Forward: W or UP ARROW KEY

Drive Backwards: S or DOWN ARROW KEY

Steering: A/D or LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYS

Break: SPACE BAR

This project was developed by Cheemis, Trunkster, Qwertless, Greemex3, and Grodus for our Introduction to Software Engineering class. This was most of our team members' FIRST-EVER game. After a lot of learning and testing, we're very proud of how this game turned out. It was a lot of fun to develop and an excellent gateway into the world of game design for our team!
